HotelElement.Name: North American Vacation Homes - Marina Del Rey Apartments

Description.Text: Marina del Rey is a gated community located close to Venice Beach. Conveniently situated for the freeway making visiting the towns of Santa Monica and Santa Barbara easy and quick. There are shops and restaurants within a 5-10 minute walk. This whole area has been transformed over recent years into a great holiday location. Clubhouse, large car park with allotted space and convenience store are located on site.
